alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 2:30PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, including Lolo Pass. 10 to 15 inches above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Lolo Pass, Dixie, and Southern Clearwater Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Prepare for slick road conditions and reduced visibility during periods of moderate to heavy snow. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
